member.name: M:C1.Win.C1TrueDBGrid.Excel.Extensions.SaveExcel(C1.Win.C1TrueDBGrid.C1TrueDBGrid,System.String,System.String,System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Provides export to Microsoft Excel file.
member.param: Name of the file to save, including the path.
Name of the sheet to add to the Excel workbook.
to use when saving the file.
Indicates whether hidden columns should be included in the export.

member.name: M:C1.Win.C1TrueDBGrid.Excel.Extensions.LoadExcel(C1.Win.C1TrueDBGrid.C1TrueDBGrid,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Provides import from Microsoft Excel file.
member.param: Name of the file to load, including the path.
Name of the sheet to load from the Excel workbook.
